content:
The status currently says

The component model is a work in progress. Although the architecture is well-defined, details are still evolving. This version of the guide is current as of late August 2023.

It'd be great if we could get the book updated to 0.2, update that date to a post-0.2 date, and be a little more confident in how we talk about the status.
@Robin Brown should be updated text now. I will also work through the examples and book to see if other parts are out of date
